p.s: PHP interface to Amazon Product Advertising API
p.d:
Services_Amazon: * PHP interface to Amazon Product Advertising API * All APIs are supported: Lookup and Search for products, Wishlists, Marketplace, customers, similar item and so on * Provide an associate tag * Remote cart support * Multiple locale support: US, UK, DE, JP, FR and CA * Caching support
Services_AmazonECS4: * DEPRECATED: After August 15, 2009, all requests will be denied. * A class using Amazon Associates Web Service 4.0 (Amazon E-Commerce Service 4.0) * Provide associate links * Remote cart support * Multiple locale support: US, UK, DE, JP, FR and CA * Caching support * See http://wiki.php.net/pear/packages/services_amazon for migration
